name: Industry Grind
tag_list: fashion, arts, media, entertainment, social-network, news-portal
overview:
We currently serve as a news portal and business network for professionals in fashion, arts, media and entertainment.

Industry Grind is a collective of social and news media brands that stand for the same thing. Hard work, integrity and perseverance.

Industry Grind, Inc was established in 2004 to serve the under-served indie market. Industry Grind provided a place for them to be seen and heard. Since then our brand has evolved into a burgeoning resource for people who work behind the scenes and talented people who want to know more about the business their in.
